body:
Comment 1: 
hg bisect claims:

The first bad revision is:
changeset:   14865:723ce500dd2c
user:        RÃ©my Oudompheng <oudomphe@phare.normalesup.org>
date:        Tue Nov 13 00:08:04 2012 +0100
summary:     cmd/6g: extend componentgen to small arrays and structs.

Sure enough that changed too, in addition to the address:

OLD WORKING:
0034 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) CALL    ,bogus1+0(SB)
0035 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) LEAQ    16(SP),BX
0036 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) LEAQ    .args+16(FP),BP
0037 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVQ    BP,DI
0038 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVQ    BX,SI
0039 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVSQ   ,
0040 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVSQ   ,
0041 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) RET     ,

NEW BROKEN:
0034 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) CALL    ,bogus1+0(SB)
0035 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVQ    32(SP),BX
0036 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVQ    BX,.args+32(FP)
0037 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVQ    40(SP),BX
0038 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) MOVQ    BX,.args+40(FP)
0039 (/Users/rsc/x.go:12) RET     ,

Planning to fix shortly.
